theUnchainedMod:DefaultUncommonSkill.NAME: A Better Defend

theUnchainedMod:TieTogether.NAME: Tie Together
theUnchainedMod:TieTogether.DESCRIPTION: theunchainedmod:Relay !M! damage. NL Everytime the player takes damage, the enemy loses health equal to the same amount. NL Exhaust.

theUnchainedMod:Cower.DESCRIPTION: theunchainedmod:Relay !M! damage. NL Gain 2 Frail. NL Apply !theUnchainedMod:SecondMagic! Vulnerable to ALL enemies.

theUnchainedMod:MorningStar.DESCRIPTION: Costs 1 less [E] for every 2-cost card played this combat. NL Enemy loses !M! health. NL Deal !D! damage.

theUnchainedMod:KeepDistance.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. ALL enemies gain !M! Block.

theUnchainedMod:MuscleMemory.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: This turn, your next 2 2-cost cards are played twice.

theUnchainedMod:SliceThrough.NAME: Slice Through
